patch.description:
Turn on cheats. This has the following effects:
- You cannot be hit - You have infinite mana - You always hit monsters and kill them in one hit - All drops are magic or unique
It unlocks the following input:
- F5: Teleport to starting house in town - F6: Teleport to level 1 - F7: Teleport to level 5 - F8: Teleport to level 9 - * (Shift+8, or numpad): gain level - Shift (hold): Allows RTS-style view scrolling when the mouse is near the edge of the screen - L: Toggle lighting - T: Show (x,y) coords on control panel - D: Show transval value on control panel - F: Decrease gamma - G: Increase gamma - M: Show invincible value on control panel - B: Increase current spell by 1 level
